business.headline: Meta plans to lay off 'lowest performance' staff next week, internal memo revealsNotices will go out to employees losing their jobs starting at 5 am local time on Monday in most countries, including in the US, according to one of the posts, authored by Meta's Head of People Janelle Gale.

Cabinet clears new income tax bill, likely to be tabled in Lok Sabha Monday: SourcesThe new legislation, which is often referred to as the Direct Tax Code, is aimed at overhauling the existing tax structure, making it more streamlined and transparent.

5 things about Mohini Mohan Dutta: The man named in Ratan Tata's willWhile most anticipated that Ratan Tata's wealth would go towards philanthropy, family members, and other charitable causes, Mohini Mohan Dutta's mention in his will has surprised many.

Infosys clarifies 'forceful' layoffs: Freshers get 3 attempts to clear assessmentInfosys said freshers undergo foundational training at its Mysuru campus and must pass an internal assessment to continue working.
Infosys 'forcefully' lays off 700 trainees in Mysuru: ReportMost of the affected recruits were from the engineering batch of 2022, who were onboarded after a wait of about 2.25 years, said sources.

Activate UAN to avail EPFO's ELI scheme benefits before February 15. Check detailsEPFO ELI: UAN or Universal Account Number is a unique 12-digit number allotted by EPFO which is necessary for managing provident fund accounts.

RBI introduces 'bank.in' domain for Indian banks to tackle financial fraudThe move aims to tackle growing financial fraud and cybercrime, prevent malicious activities, and strengthen the country's financial ecosystem.
RBI cuts key lending rate after 5 years: 6 takeaways from the announcementThe central bank has announced a reduction in the repo rate by 25 basis points for the first time in nearly five years.
After 5 years, RBI cut key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6.25%This marks the first rate cut since 2020 and the first policy decision under Governor Malhotra's leadership.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts rates. Check detailsThe RBI MPC reduced key lending rates by 25 basis points to 6.25%, the first rate cut in nearly five years under the leadership of newly appointed RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra.
RBI reduces key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6.25%The rate cut announced by the committee is the first since 2020. This was also the first policy meeting of Sanjay Malhotra as RBI Governor.
Stock markets open flat as investors await RBI policy decision; ITC down 2%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 23.98 points to 78,034.18, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 7 points to 23,596.35 as of 9:35 AM.
HDFC Bank UPI services unavailable on this date. Get details hereDuring the downtime, the UPI transactions on HDFC Bank's current and savings accounts and RuPay credit cards will be affected.

Zomato to be Eternal? Deepinder Goyal says company name change cleared by boardThe renaming announcement comes weeks after Zomato entered the BSE Sensex on December 23, which coincides with the 17th anniversary of its founding.

What if you default on personal loan? Check consequencesPersonal loan default consequences: Banks or lenders impose hefty penalties, or late fee charges in case of a missed EMI amount. They may even impose higher interest charges and additional charges for collection efforts.

Want to redeem credit card points? Check these 2 simple ways How to redeem credit card points: The number of credit card points one earns depends on the type of card, whether basic or premium, and the amount spent.
Sensex, Nifty fall sharply as D-Street remains edgy ahead of RBI's rate decisionThe S&P BSE Sensex closed 213.12 points lower at 78,058.16 and the NSE Nifty50 settled 92.95 points lower at 23,603.35.

entertainment.headline: The Mehta Boys to Mrs: Top 6 OTT releases this weekThis weekend, a variety of highly anticipated South films and original titles are set to release on OTT platforms, offering viewers a diverse selection for binge-watching. Check out the list of the OTT releases of the week.

Lamar has recently been in the news for winning five Grammys for his diss track Not Like Us, directed at rapper Drake.

Maryade Prashne OTT release: When and where to watch the revenge dramaThe revenge family drama Maryade Prashne, which released in November last year, is now available to stream on a major OTT platform.

Bada Naam Karenge review: Sweet, familiar and full of sanskaarsReleased-Fri Feb 07, 2025Bada Naam Karenge is a classic Rajshri Productions love story with sweet romance, catchy music, and family drama. While it evokes nostalgia, its simple plot and dated gender roles may not resonate with all. Strong performances and a heartfelt message make it a warm, fulfilling watch.

Ram Kapoor on 55 kg weight loss: No Ozempic, just hard workRam Kapoor's 55 kg weight loss has sparked widespread speculation about the methods he used. However, Kapoor clarified on social media that his transformation was achieved through hard work and dedication, dismissing the use of shortcuts like Ozempic or surgery.

Kinda Pregnant review: Amy Schumer's comedy film barely deliversReleased-Wed Feb 05, 2025Amy Schumer returns with Kinda Pregnant, a comedy that struggles to hit the mark. Despite its premise of friendship and motherhood, it fails to offer fresh laughs or insights.

Justin Bieber, wife Hailey step out for a date amid divorce rumoursJustin and Hailey Bieber were seen enjoying a date night in New York City, countering recent divorce rumours. Despite reports of marital strain linked to Justin's legal anxieties, the couple appeared united.

Anuja review: Raw performances, hard-hitting subject make it a compelling watchReleased-Thu Feb 06, 2025Anuja movie review: Oscar-nominated Anuja is a gripping short film on child labour and resilience. With stellar performances and a hard-hitting narrative, it is a must-watch on Netflix.

The Night Agent Season 2 review: Equal parts dramatic and delectably excitingReleased-Thu Jan 23, 2025In The Night Agent Season 2 on Netflix, a spy recruited by the most secretive body of the FBI, gets entangled in the mysteries of state secrets and in-house traitors. Peter Sutherland is back to save his country from falling.

Kadhalikka Neramillai on OTT: When and where to watch Nithya Menen, Ravi Mohan filmNithya Menen and Ravi Mohan's Kadhalikka Neramillai is reportedly gearing up for its OTT debut on Netflix. The film was earlier released in theatres during the Pongal festival.

A Hindi adaptation of 'The Great Indian Kitchen', Mrs delves into themes of patriarchy and unfulfilled aspirations.

Milind Deora's 'woke' dig at Grammys for not honouring tabla icon Zakir HussainShiv Sena leader and Member of Parliament Milind Deora took a dig at the Grammys for omitting Tabla maestro Zakir Hussain's name from their In Memoriam segment. Zakir Hussain, who died in December 2024, was a four-time Grammy winner.

Kendrick Lamar vs Drake: Did the Grammys settle the 'battle rap'?Rappers Kendrick Lamar and Drake's feud spans over a decade, with diss tracks, accusations, and a lawsuit. From collaborations to lyrical attacks, here's a full breakdown of their ongoing rap battle.

general news.headline: To avenge Ayodhya defeat, BJP turns Milkipur by-poll into prestige battle Live UpdatesMilkipur ByPoll 2025: Results for the bypoll in Milkipur in Uttar Pradesh will be declared today. BJP leaders, including Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath, turned the Milkipur Assembly by-election into a prestige battle. Months after losing the Faizabad Lok Sabha seat that houses the Ayodhya Ram Mandir, the BJP has called on voters in Milkipur to "avenge the defeat". This is why Milkipur, one of the five Assembly segments of Faizabad, is a prestige battle.

Trump revokes Biden's security clearances: Joe, you're fired Donald Trump announced he is revoking Joe Biden's security clearance, ending his access to classified information and intelligence briefings. Trump declared the decision on Truth Social, stating, "Joe, you're fired."

Missing plane carrying 10 found on sea ice in Alaska, 3 deadThree bodies were found in an aircraft that went missing in Alaska on Thursday. The plane was carrying 10 people and its wreckage was found on sea ice.

Trump's plan to absorb Canada 'a real thing,' warns Justin Trudeau: ReportCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said US President Donald Trump's idea of absorbing Canada is "a real thing" linked to the country's natural resources. He made the remarks while discussing US tariff threats with business and labour leaders.

5 things that might have undone AAP if exit polls come trueThe BJP is making massive gains in Delhi and could edge out the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP), if exit polls are to be believed. Here are the five main factors that might have worked for the BJP and worked against the AAP if the election results, set to be out today, turn out to be what is being predicted.

Erode bypoll results LIVE updates: DMK eyes easy win in Tamil Nadu seatThe by-election, necessitated by the death of Congress legislator EVKS Elangovan on December 14, 2024, was boycotted by major political parties such as the AIADMK and the BJP. Although 46 candidates contested for the election, the real face-off is between DMK's VC Chandrikumar and NTK's MK Seethalakshmi. The voting on Wednesday, February 5, in the by-election witnessed over 70 per cent turnout.

Could Axar Patel keep Rishabh Pant on bench in Champions Trophy? Manjrekar reactsSanjay Manjrekar feels that Axar Patel's versatility could force Rishabh Pant to spend time on the bench. Axar scored a fine fifty during India's 1st ODI win against England in Nagpur.

Congressman, JD Vance's X war as DOGE staffer who quit over racist posts reinstatedMarko Elez resigned from DOGE after the Wall Street Journal published a report linking him to a now-deleted account on X, where he made some racist posts. In one post last September, Elez reportedly said, "You could not pay me to marry outside of my ethnicity,"  and in another one, he wrote, "Just for the record, I was racist before it was cool."

Not BJP, Congress might hurt AAP the most in these 12 Delhi seats. Here's whyWith results due today, the 2025 Delhi Assembly election has narrowed to a two-way contest between AAP and Congress in 12 of the 70 seats. This is why the 12 seats will see an AAP-Congress direct contest, and are among the 30 that the Congress is focusing on to stay relevant in Delhi's politics.

Judge blocks Trump's plan to put thousands of US aid agency employees on leaveThe Trump administration and Elon Musk, who is heading a budget-cutting Department of Government Efficiency, have made USAID their biggest target so far in an unprecedented challenge of the federal government and many of its programs.

India summons Bangladesh envoy after Dhaka protests Sheikh Hasina's remarksIndia summoned Bangladesh's Acting High Commissioner over Dhaka's recent statements blaming New Delhi for internal issues. The Centre reiterated its commitment to positive ties but criticised Bangladesh's negative portrayal.

Who is Maaya Rajeshwaran? 15-year-old tennis prodigy into WTA 125 semi-finalAt just 15, Maaya Rajeshwaran's stunning run at the L&T Mumbai Open has made her the youngest Indian to earn a WTA point, cementing her place as one of the country's brightest tennis prospects.

Arvind Kejriwal gets anti-graft body's notice: Submit proof of 'Op Lotus' chargeThe development, which comes a day before counting of votes in Delhi, took place as the Lt Governor directed the ACB to probe AAP's 'Operation Lotus' charge against the BJP.

How UPA-era numbers blow a hole in Rahul Gandhi's poll-fraud allegationsA closer look at Maharashtra's voter data since 2009 shows that the recent spike in registered voters is not unusual. The trends over the past 15 years challenge Congress leader Rahul Gandhi's claim that the voter list was manipulated ahead of the 2024 Maharashtra Assembly poll, and the election stolen from the Maha Vikas Aghadi.

Hamas to release 3 more hostages today, Israel likely to free 183 PalestiniansEarlier, the Palestinian militant group accused Israel of breaching their ceasefire accord and held off announcing the names of the three Israelis until a 4 pm (1400 GMT) deadline had passed.

Offbeat vacations are trending, but are they truly offbeat? With overcrowding becoming a global issue, travellers—including Indians—are seeking offbeat destinations. But social media has turned the search into a paradox.

Did Indians deported by US violate Indian laws too?Every country prohibits illegal entry of foreigners, and that is why the US has deported 104 Indians. But did these Indians, and the lakhs of others from India who are illegally residing in the US violate Indian laws too? Do these violations attract prison terms?

Kalkaji Live: BJP's Ramesh Bidhuri ahead of AAP's Atishi in very early leads Kalkaji Assembly Election Result 2025 Live: Delhi Assembly election results will be announced today as counting of votes will begin shortly. The Kalkaji assembly constituency is among the most closely contested seats in the 2025 Delhi polls. This high profile constituency is witnessing a triangular contest between Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) candidate and Delhi chief minister Atishi, BJP's Ramesh Bidhuri and Congress's Alka Lamba. In the 2020 Delhi Assembly elections, Atishi won the seat with 55,897 votes, defeating BJP's Dharmveer and Congress's Shivani Chopra. Follow indiatoday.in for more updates.

Greater Kailash Live: AAP's Saurabh Bhardwaj ahead of BJP in very early leadsGreater Kailash Assembly Election Result 2025 Live: Delhi Assembly election results will be announced today as counting of votes will begin shortly. The Greater Kailash Assembly Constituency is one of the 70 assembly constituencies in Delhi. The assembly constituency is expected to be a key battleground for the Delhi polls. Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) candidate and Delhi Minister Saurabh Bhardwaj is contesting for the seat against BJP's Shikha Rai and Congress's Garvit Singhvi. He won the seat in 2020 and 2015. Follow indiatoday.in for more updates.

Gautam Adani's son Jeet marries Diva Shah in intimate ceremonyGautam Adani took to social media site X and shared the information along with some pictures from the wedding which took place in Gujarat's Ahmedabad earlier in the day.

Patparganj Live: BJP takes early lead in Patparganj as AAP's Avadh Ojha trailsPatparganj Assembly Election Result 2025 Live: Counting of votes in the Patparganj Assembly seat began with UPSC educator Avadh Ojha, who has been fielded by AAP, up against BJP's Ravinder Singh Negi and Anil Kumar of the Congress. AAP leader and former Delhi Deputy Chief Minister Manish Sisodia held the seat for a brief period in 2013, and again since 2015, and is now contesting from Jangpura. The seat is crucial for AAP as it has considerable presence of Poorvanchalis - those belonging from eastern Uttar Pradesh and Bihar. A win for Ojha will consolidate the AAP's position in Patparganj, while a defeat will end the 10-year-long dominance of the party in this seat. Follow indiatoday.in for live updates.

Jangpura Live: Manish Sisodia trails as BJP takes early lead in JangpuraJangpura Assembly Election Result 2025 Live: All eyes will be on the Jangpura Assembly seat in southeast Delhi, where Manish Sisodia, currently an MLA from Patparganj, is facing BJP's Tarvinder Singh Marwah and Farhad Suri of the Congress. Counting of votes began at 8 am. Sisodia, who has represented Patparganj since 2015, shifted to Jangpura as UPSC educator Avadh Ojha was fielded from there. The stakes are high for Sisodia, who spent in jail for 17 months, in connection with the Delhi liquor policy case. Will Sisodia emerge victorious from Jangpura or can the BJP or Congress play spoilsport? Follow indiatoday.in for live updates.

Live Updates: AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal trails in New Delhi, BJP ahead in very early leadsNew Delhi Assembly Election Result 2025 Live: Counting of votes for the high-stakes Delhi Assembly elections has commenced, with all eyes on the all-important New Delhi seat. Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) chief Arvind Kejriwal is pitted against BJP's Parvesh Verma and Congress's Sandeep Dikshit. In 2013, when he made his political debut, Kejriwal won the seat by a margin of 44,269 votes against then Chief Minister Sheila Dixit. In 2015, he won by 57,213 votes and 46,758 in the 2020 Assembly polls. The New Delhi Assembly seat, located at the heart of the capital, covers some of the most prominent neighbourhoods of Lutyens' Delhi, including Connaught Place, Central Secretariat, Lodhi Colony, Jor Bagh, Sarojini Nagar, Janpath, and Gole Market. Stay tuned to India Today as we bring you the latest counting updates

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.
